about_the_game:
This Fantasy themed package can be used to further customize your Female Adventurer characters, set in various middle age and early modern age settings.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 7 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 5 hair presets
- 3 hats with hair
- 18 boots
- 16 pants
- 23 tops
- 7 full set of clothes
- 8 underwears
- 5 armguards
- 4 chest items
- 1 coat
- 1 loincloth
- 1 necklace
- 1 thigh item
- 2 tiaras
- 11 waist items
- 4 weapons

Additional content available to all Season #2 Fantasy themed packs in the General category:
- 7 backgrounds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 pixels or higher desktop resolution
